dict.acceptation: （服务的）对象；目标；（射击的）靶子；目的；

sent.orig: That rule creates new instance of type-target, associated with that type.
sent.trans: 该规则创建type-target的新实例，关联至该类型。

sent.orig: Customs and Border Protection required Target to know where our products are being produced.
sent.trans: 美国海关与边防局要求Target了解我们的产品是在哪里生产的。

sent.orig: Target reported a 2.9 percent decline but exceeded expectations.
sent.trans: Target汇报下跌了2.9%，但是仍旧超过预期水平。

sent.orig: Some big retailers, such as Saks and Target, have recently reported rising revenues and margins.
sent.trans: 某些大型零售商，像Saks和Target,已经报告说营业收入和毛利得到了提升。

sent.orig: When creating hard links, each TARGET must exist.
sent.trans: 当创建硬链结的时候，链接指向德target必须存在。
